bike.description: The Sempre Pro was created for the rider who loves to race, dominate local group rides, and still pocket a little extra coin for the latest accessories. Like the Oltre, the Sempre Pro was developed and continually refined to meet the demands of professional racers and discerning enthusiasts. Equally adept at climbing and sprinting, the Sempre Pro’s well-balanced, Born for Performance frame will deliver precision handling with maximum speed however challenging the course may be. The Sempre Pro features all the must-haves for the discerning cyclist; a tapered head tube, full carbon fork, Pressfit 30 bottom bracket, and oversized down tube and chain stays for explosive, out-of- the-saddle acceleration. Bianchi’s exclusive UTSS technology maximizes power transfer while still maintaining a comfortable ride. Internal cable-routing accommodates both mechanical and electronic drivetrains. Sempre literally means Always. Count on the Sempre Pro to always deliver the most responsive and exciting ride you can handle! Frame: Sempre, BB30, UTSS, compatible mechanical and electronic.
